item.title: Terminal/Command Line Shortcuts and Handy Helpers
item.description: The following are some terminal commands that I have come across and found helpful, handy, often used and/or short-cutty. This is mostly aimed at beginners who haven’t memorised a lot of commands yet or people who forget them a lot (like me!). Enjoy! âœ¨ To open bash profile in atom: atom ~/.bash_profile Remove whole directory (that is git directory or whatever) without being asked about y/n: rm -rf <name-of-directory> You installed live server globally with
